pubs.name: The Old Fire Station
pubs.desc: Nightspot in old fire station for eclectic live music and club nights, plus student union events.

pubs.name: Inferno
pubs.desc: Split-level bar with stripped flooring, sofas, a pool table and a beer garden plus diner-style fare.

pubs.name: Sound Circus
pubs.desc: Club with heavy rock leanings, popular with students for its loud music and drinks specials.

pubs.name: The Anvil
pubs.sub: New Bournemouth hub for all things rock..
pubs.desc: The Anvil include an extensive rock jukebox, live gigs, a huge collection of beers, ciders and spirits, rock n roll decor

pubs.name: Bomo Cafe Bar
pubs.desc: Bomo Cafe Bar & Bunker set in a relaxed, rustic orangery style cafe bar & terrace situated over 3 floors at this cuturally historic building

pubs.name: The Christopher Creeke
pubs.desc: A modern Wetherspoon's pub with basic decor, dark patterned carpets, real ales, ciders and pub grub.

pubs.name: O'Neill's
pubs.desc: Relaxed chain pub with big-screen sport, live music and Irish-influenced food and drink menus

pubs.name: George Tapps
pubs.desc: Lively bar with food and drink deals, showing live sport on plasma screens, plus sofas and terrace.

pubs.name: Sharkeys Sports Bar Bournemouth
pubs.desc: Cavernous bar with 10 American pool tables, 10 HD screens for sports events and a burger menu.
